title: Perma Ban.
body:
I am not perma banned as of yet, I also so have had no warnings but I would be really interested in finding out what my record looks like.

I would also like for someone to point out where in the terms of use it says anything about being permanently banned and the laws that allow riot to do this. Because I believe in Australia we own the account we use and it can be locked but once we spend money on it. It becomes ours.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I believe you should be able to obtain the information you want (Chat logs, report history) from [this page](https://privacy.riotgames.com) (For a small fee).

On the subject of your consumer rights, Riot owns your account, Riot Games reserves the right to suspend, terminate, modify or delete your account as they see fit.

>(1)     By Riot Games.  TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, RIOT GAMES RESERVES THE RIGHT TO SUSPEND, TERMINATE, MODIFY OR DELETE YOUR ACCOUNT AT ANY TIME FOR ANY REASON OR NO REASON, AND, UNLESS OTHERWISE REQUIRED BY LAW, WITH NO LIABILITY OF ANY KIND TO YOU.  Additionally, Riot Games may stop offering and/or supporting the Game at any time.  For purposes of explanation and not limitation, most Account suspensions, terminations and/or deletions are the result of violation of this Agreement, the EULA, the Privacy Policy, or the Summonerâ€™s Code (defined below).  Accounts terminated by Riot Games shall not be reinstated under any conditions whatsoever.
